StoryText: It's my first day at a new job.
Question: What shirt should I wear?

OptionResult.Result: I wear this and apparently I look really good in it because I am getting a lot of looks.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, apparently red is my color. I am getting a lot of looks all throughout the office. A lot of people are talking to me too, which is great, except I am having trouble paying attention to my work and am a little lost.

OptionResult.Result: I wear this and someone mistakes me for another person and gives me the $50 they "owed me."
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I felt good and professional in my blue shirt all day. And the day was going well, getting along with my boss %FullName:NPC:1% and then randomly near the end of the day someone gave me the $50 they "owed me" as they put it. They must have thought I was someone else. Lucky blue shirt, I guess!

OptionResult.Result: My boss %FullName:NPC:1% tells me that black is %Pron:1:3% favorite color.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Interestingly, my boss %FullName:NPC:1% tells me black is %Pron:1:3% favorite color and then %Pron:1:1% seems to really take a liking to me and shows me all the ins and outs of the job and goes into great depth of how to be successful here. Maybe I should only wear black shirts!
